Subjects: advice, to lovers; precepts; youth; lovers, advice to
_description: Advice to love while young — two couplets

HunHM19914.Transcription:
Marke My wordes well& ber thym in my[nde]appli thy loves in
                    sythin age thou shal be [blynde]
HunHM19914.Note:
Added to originally blank leaf by a hand of the late fifteenth
                    century.
